long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Kuvera extension to import jobs from LinkedIn. Then use the Kuvera.ai website to analyze the posting, customize your cover letter and resume for the posting, and analyze your offers.
